select * from course where cos_fee=0

select * from course where order by cos_start_date,cos_start_time
mapper.insert: insert into course (cos_title, cos_start_date, cos_end_date, cos_start_time, cos_end_time, cos_stage, cos_fee, cos_category, cos_status) values (#{course.cosTitle}, #{course.cosStartDate}, #{course.cosEndDate}, #{course.cosStartTime}, #{course.cosEndTime}, #{course.cosStage}, #{course.cosFee}, #{course.cosCategory}, #{course.cosStatus})
